name: Mad Modder
description:
Scrounge up halved guns and join them into crazy new combinations to take out enemies! Each part has a unique effect on the created firearm.

STORY:

Wanting to get out of arms dealing and criminal business, you enquire with your boss, the leader of the Toro Cartel, about ending further contracts. He laughs in your face and orders you out. Seeking revenge, you plan to take out the Toro Cartel's key infrastructure and kill your boss using your mad gunsmithing skills.

This is my first jam game, and also my first uploaded game. 

CONTROLS:

arrows - move left and right, down to go through platforms

Z - jump

X - shoot

C - punch

A - discard current weapon
